```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(reticulate)
```

Box plots of c.b telomere lengths: 

```{r}
cb_len <- as_tibble(read_tsv('/Users/shrirambhat/Desktop/data/briggsae_QX1410_telomere_length.tsv'))
cb_len <- cb_len %>% arrange(desc(length))
```
```{r}
p <- ggplot(data=cb_len,aes(x=isotype,y=length)) +
    geom_bar(stat='identity')
p
```
